ygData.subject: Revenge!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, Just thought of this, ok, so I am kinda bored... Go to South Karana. Charm Herman the hermit.  Then take him up to Valen Nostrolo and let them fite it
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe,

Just thought of this, ok, so I am kinda bored...

Go to South Karana. Charm Herman the hermit. Then take him up to Valen
Nostrolo and let them fite it out. Hehe, might have to re-charm Herm and
keep sic'ing him onto Vahlen. And after Vahlen kills Herm, you'd need to
zone. But I think that would be kinda funny to see the two of them going at
it <eg>.

Sylly

p.s. ya, sometimes I will charm Ren'Rexx or Ghnex Drah and run them down to
fite the Tesch Gnolls in a valient but futile effort to win back their home.
